column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Based on your other reviews
column2: I would consider you something of a ramen expert. But while you are probably more inclined to dine at some of our competitors
column3: please allow me to say that just a few years ago Houstonians did not have so many options when it came to ramen. But today
column4: there are more than a dozen standalone ramen restaurants in our beloved city
column5: and I think we can both agree that is a good thing. Thanks again
column6: and we wish you the best.
